name: Authors Quiz: The Great Gatsby | 10 Questions

questions.text: Jay is in love with whom?
Who lived next door to Gatsby?
Who is Gatsby's 'business connection' who Nick meets at the restaurant the first time he and Gatsby go out for lunch?
questions.explanation:
Meyer Wolfsheim.

	His cufflinks were made of human molars!

questions.text: In what war did Nick and Gatsby serve in together?
questions.correct: World War I & WWI & World War One & First World War & The Great War& WW1 & World War 1
questions.explanation: World War I & WWI & World War One & First World War & The Great War& WW1 & World War 1.

gets hit by a car.

	Daisy was the driver who hit her

questions.text: Tom is married to Daisy, but who's he having an affair with?
Every night, Gatsby stares at a light at the end of Daisy's dock. What color is it?
Who is the 'morally good' person in the book?

questions.correct: F Scott Fitzgerald & Francis Scott Fitzgerald & F. Scott Fitzgerald
questions.explanation: F Scott Fitzgerald & Francis Scott Fitzgerald & F. Scott Fitzgerald
